pullrequest.title: Add Link::GetWorldAngularMomentum, enable bullet gyroscopic forces

content.raw: I see what you mean, this is a huge tolerance. I won't pretend to know what's going on with DART here, but perhaps this test should be disabled for DART instead of raising the tolerance? I'm not convinced that angular moment is giving a meaningful result if the total tolerance has to be on the order of 1e2.
content.html: I see what you mean, this is a huge tolerance. I won't pretend to know what's going on with DART here, but perhaps this test should be disabled for DART instead of raising the tolerance? I'm not convinced that angular moment is giving a meaningful result if the total tolerance has to be on the order of 1e2.
